verses.verse: Then He said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Come <S%H5927><s%> up to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> you and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%> and seventy <S%H7657><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and you shall worship <S%H7812><s%> at a distance. <S%H7350><s%>

"Moses <S%H4872><s%> alone, <S%H905><s%> however, shall come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> but they shall not come <S%H5066><s%> near, <S%H5066><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> shall the people <S%H5971><s%> come <S%H5927><s%> up with him."

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and recounted <S%H5608><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the ordinances; <S%H4941><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "All <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> we will do! <S%H6213><s%>"

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> down <S%H3789><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> Then he arose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> at the foot <S%H8478><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> with twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> pillars <S%H4676><s%> for the twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> young <S%H5288><s%> men <S%H5288><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and they offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings <S%H5930><s%> and sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> young <S%H6499><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> as peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H8002><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> [it] in basins, <S%H101><s%> and the [other] half <S%H2677><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> he sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Then he took <S%H3947><s%> the book <S%H5612><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and read <S%H7121><s%> [it] in the hearing <S%H241><s%> of the people; <S%H5971><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> "All <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> we will do, <S%H6213><s%> and we will be obedient! <S%H8085><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> and sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> [it] on the people, <S%H5971><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold <S%H2009><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has made <S%H3772><s%> with you in accordance <S%H5921><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words. <S%H1697><s%>"
Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up with Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> and seventy <S%H7657><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

and they saw <S%H7200><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> His feet <S%H7272><s%> there appeared to be a pavement <S%H3843><s%> of sapphire, <S%H5601><s%> as clear <S%H2892><s%> as the sky <S%H8064><s%> itself. <S%H6106><s%>

Yet He did not stretch <S%H7971><s%> out His hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the nobles <S%H678><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and they beheld <S%H2372><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and they ate <S%H398><s%> and drank. <S%H8354><s%>

Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Come <S%H5927><s%> up to Me on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> and remain <S%H1961><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you the stone <S%H68><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> with the law <S%H8451><s%> and the commandment <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have written <S%H3789><s%> for their instruction. <S%H3384><s%>"
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> with Joshua <S%H3091><s%> his servant, <S%H8334><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

But to the elders <S%H2205><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Wait <S%H3427><s%> here <S%H2088><s%> for us until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> we return <S%H7725><s%> to you. And behold, <S%H2009><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Hur <S%H2354><s%> are with you; whoever <S%H4310><s%> has a legal matter, <S%H1697><s%> let him approach <S%H5066><s%> them."
Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

And the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> rested <S%H7931><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> it for six <S%H8337><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> He called <S%H7121><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the cloud. <S%H6051><s%>

And to the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was like a consuming <S%H398><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> top. <S%H7218><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%> as he went <S%H5927><s%> up to the mountain; <S%H2022><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> was on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights. <S%H3915><s%>
